mapper.select: SELECT B.score, B.item1_result, B.item2_result, B.item3_result, B.item4_result, B.item5_result, B.item6_result, B.item7_result, B.item8_result, B.item9_result, B.item10_result, B.item11_result, B.item12_result, B.item13_result, B.item14_result, B.item15_result, B.item16_result FROM ( SELECT t2.user_id, t2.ip_address FROM user AS t0, client AS t2 WHERE t0.department_idx = #{departmentCode} AND t0.user_id = t2.user_id) AS A LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT *, ROW_NUMBER() over (PARTITION BY user_id, ip_address ORDER BY check_time DESC) AS r0 FROM user_result WHERE DATE_FORMAT(check_time, '%Y-%m') = #{yearMonth} ) AS B ON A.user_id = B.user_id AND A.ip_address = B.ip_address AND A.ip_address = B.ip_address AND B.r0 = 1 AND B.in_schedule = 1 WHERE (B.item1_result != 0 OR B.item2_result != 0 OR B.item3_result != 0 OR B.item4_result != 0 OR B.item5_result != 0 OR B.item6_result != 0 OR B.item7_result != 0 OR B.item8_result != 0 OR B.item9_result != 0 OR B.item10_result != 0 OR B.item11_result != 0 OR B.item12_result != 0 OR B.item13_result != 0 OR B.item14_result != 0 OR B.item15_result != 0 OR B.item16_result != 0)

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT A.department_idx, A.user_id, B.ip_address FROM user as A, client as B WHERE A.user_id = B.user_id AND A.department_idx = #{departmentCode} ) AS t0 LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT *, ROW_NUMBER() over (PARTITION BY user_id, ip_address ORDER BY check_time DESC) AS r0 FROM user_result WHERE DATE_FORMAT(check_time, '%Y-%m') = #{yearMonth} ) AS t1 ON t0.user_id = t1.user_id AND t0.ip_address = t1.ip_address
WHERE t1.r0 = 1 AND in_schedule = 1
